meanings.definition: The act or process of bringing goods or services into a country from abroad.
meanings.sent1: The importations of fruits and vegetables increased this month.
meanings.sent2: Customs officers inspected the importations at the border.
meanings.sent3: The mix-up at the airport led to the importations being sent to the wrong city.
meanings.sent4: Her suitcase was like a treasure chest full of importations from exotic lands.
meanings.sent5: The importations of rare spices filled the market with new scents.

meanings.definition: Goods or services that are brought into a country from abroad.
meanings.sent1: The store's shelves were stocked with various importations.
meanings.sent2: The importations included electronics and clothing.
meanings.sent3: The chef's secret ingredient was a special importation from overseas.
meanings.sent4: The library's collection was an importation of knowledge from around the world.
meanings.sent5: The importations of luxury cars caught the attention of many buyers.
